text: ivarkal allah allatavarrai(t tankalukkuc) ciparicu ceypavarkal enru (enni) etuttuk kontirukkinranara? â€˜â€˜Avai etarkum cakti arrataka, etaiyum ariyakkutiya unarcci arrataka iruntaluma (avarrai ninkal unkalukkuc ciparicu ceypavai enru etuttuk kolvirkal)?'' Enru (napiye!) Avarkalaik ketpiraka
